name: Brotherhood
description:
The man you took care of for years passed away recently, and his funeral is being held in a small town in the eastern mountains of France, by his estranged brother you've never met.

A short, feel-good LGBT story about family - chosen, found, re-found. Plays in approximately 45 minutes.

"This is a genuinely touching and heartwarming story. The characters, the town, they feel real, and oh so human. An inspiration on empathy that will put a smile on your face!" - @FawkesyGrandpa

"A neat little game that makes you emotional about a family of fictional people. It's very good !" @orpiiment

"I cried." - @lilas__ubac
